column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Oh my goodness! This place was delicious. We came here on a recommendation. Brunch on a Saturday for 3 people and a baby. The line was long
column2: but moved at a good pace. Be prepared to have some patience. The parking lot was pretty full (naturally) so be prepared to have patience here as well. But
column4: that's when it all becomes worth it!
